page.title: 24Changes in Mansfield Woodhouse: Society
page.content: There are many opportunities for all ages to get together in Mansfield Woodhouse, with regular activities e.g. Summer Fair on Yeoman Park, Christmas Fair and Community band concerts and quizzes at Turner Hall. Many of the elderly population use battery operated mobility scooters to get around the area, visit family, shop and attend social events. Clothes are mostly casual and of manmade fibres making them easily laundered. Jeans are very popular everyday wear.
